item.title: PlayByPlay AI: SMS & Email to Instant Meme Moments
item.description: Imagine texting a score or emailing your favorite live‑event details and instantly receiving the perfect memeable highlight—PlayByPlay AI turns any live TV moment into shareable gold via SMS or email.
item.author: contact@quantumcybersolutions.com (Quantum Cyber Solutions)
